turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I want you to call the Starbucks located on Main Street in New York City.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That works, what type of drinks do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a Caffè Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size do you want and other details for your Caffè Latte?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make it grande size and nonfat milk with no whipped cream because I don't like it. Also, add some honey and a straw.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will put that down right now and call to make the order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you check if they provide any cup holders?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They do provide a cup holder that you can put it next to your cup holder.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's great, please tell them to provide me a cup holder.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you would like me to include?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Tell them to include some napkins along with some extra honey bags.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will tell them to include those two requests.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How long do you think I will have to wait?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me know check because I am making the order right now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is fine, just keep me updated because I am not too far from the Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I think they should have your drink soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds good, I hope so.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you not worry, it will be done in a timely manner.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is what I want to hear, good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Already, your Caffè Latte drink is ordered and it will shortly be ready for pick up on Main Street in New York City. Also a receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you for all of your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: My pleasure.
